=Installing=

==Packages==

OpenSuse Build Service Packages for (K)Ubuntu, OpenSuse, Fedora and Mandriva can be found from the [http://kde-apps.org/content/show.php?content=20121 KDE-Look.org page].

==Source Package==

Installing source package:
{{{
tar xjvf kmediafactory-* 
cd kmediafactory-* 
./configure 
make 
sudo make install 
}}}
